    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Aggravating Scratch](/Feats.aspx?ID=1262) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Catfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=211" />
<trait label="Disease" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=46" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 10 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
claw unarmed attack

</column>

---

Your claws carry an irritant that is harmless to you but can be damaging to others. Your claw Strikes deal an additional 1d4 [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) on a critical hit.
name: Aggravating Scratch
